restcalend Module
================

This module generates a reStructuredText table for a given month's calendar, assuming the 1st day is a Monday.

.. automodule:: restcalend
   :members:

Example Output
-------------

Running ``python3 -m restcalend 2024 4`` generates:

.. include:: ../../calendar_2024_4.rst

.. image:: images/calendar_example.png
   :alt: Calendar Example
   :width: 300px
